participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Emily enjoys quiet moments and deep conversations. She is a bit shy but opens up to those she trusts.
participant_1.background: I am close to my parents, but we are not very similar. I live in a small apartment with my cat Charlie, but I dream of having a house with a big yard so they can run around. I'm a bit nervous about going to the baby shower because I'm worried about being stared at. I have no use for a crib, but I would love to have a music studio in my dorm room. I've been with my current partner for three years, and we're going strong.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and easygoing, Jake loves to meet new people and is always up for a good conversation. He has a laid-back attitude toward life.
participant_2.background: I do my laundry every week. I don't really care about social media, I prefer to spend my time doing other things. I like to run so that I can clear my head. I used social media to stay connected with my friends and family during the holidays, but I didn't let it take over my life. My favorite car is the ford mustang.

content.text: Not much, just got home from work.
Oh cool, what do you do for work?
It is! I get to work with a lot of different people and I'm always learning new things.
That's awesome! I'm glad you like it.
Thanks! What do you do for fun?
I like to run and play video games.
That's cool! I like to run too. Do you have a favorite video game?
I love the new Mario Kart!
I've heard good things about it! I've been playing the new Call of Duty a lot lately.
Oh, I've heard that's really good too!
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go for a run or play some video games.
Sounds like a good plan! I'm going to visit my parents.
Oh, that sounds fun! I hope you have a good time
